trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There was one other sighting in Pensacola on or around March 16th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving north on scenic hwy, saw 3 fireball (glowing mostly orange slight redish when faded out)in a row about eyeball level over the water of escambia bay off in the distance. Closely resembled flares, however, they did not move, only faded in and out very slowly a couple times. Was a bit cloudy out, but these shapes appeared below cloud level. These were very distinct from other airplanes and aircraft seen, they did not move. Slightly windy conditions, 55 degrees, visibility was good.
Summary: 3 fireball shapes in a row, fading in and out over escambia bay
